data:
Typhoon is a cloud-native eventing platform that enables you bridge events between sources and targets.There are various needed concepts to achieve this bridging.
Sources
Targets
Transformations
Flows
This is the documentation for Typhoon, a cloud-native event bridge for Kubernetes.
data.install#Install:
Helm is the recommended way to install Typhoon.
Learn more about Typhoon in the Getting Started guide.
